Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Southbound Reroute near King Drive/67th
ShortDescription: SB 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 67th, South Chicago, Keefe, 69th and King Drive: due to, street blockage near King Drive/67th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 67th, South Chicago, Keefe, 69th and King Drive: due to, street blockage near King Drive/67th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
